question: You and your family are moving to another country for work, and you are looking to buy a house there.Write a letter to a property agent. In your letter:Introduce yourself and your familyDescribe the type of accommodation that you hope to findGive your preference for the location of the accommodation
text: This is Jerry, planning to immigrate to Canada next month. I have been working as a lead engineer in Tata Consultancy Services Ltd. My company has given me an opportunity to move to Canada along with my family. I am writing to enquire about purchasing a house in the new country.

Firstly, I would like to purchase a three-bedroom apartment where all four of us could stay together. It must have facilities like electricity back up, laundry room and uninterrupted gas supplies. Furthermore, I wish to get one that falls within my budget between $600000 to $700000.

I am looking for this property in the city centre, close to amenities such as good schooling, convenience stores and entertainment. In addition, if the location is closer to a health care centre would be more convenient because my younger son is having health concerns.
I would be grateful if you could help me in finding a suitable accommodation with the above-mentioned requirements. I look forward to hearing from you soon.

error_list.error_des: The indefinite article, a, may be redundant when used with the uncountable noun accommodation in your sentence. Consider removing it.
